page.title: 16MANY STRINGS TO HIS BOW
page.content: {VILLAGE CHARACTER { { WEST BERGHOLT MAN BOB RAYMOND HAS {A MUSICAL SCORE THAT MANY PEOPLE {CANNOT EQUAL.}HE HAS MADE MORE VIOLAS THAN STRADIVARIUS.HIS INSTRUMENTS HAVE BEEN SNAPPED UP BY PROFESSIONAL AND AMATUER MUSICIANS ALIKE.UP TO THE PRESENT TIME HE HAS BUILT 24 VIOLINS, 23 VIOLAS AND 4 CELLOS. THE PRICE STARTS AT 500 POUNDS.HE SAYS,"TO ALL INTENTS AND PURPOSES MY INSTRUMENTS ARE COMPLETELY HAND MADE,USING TRADITIONAL TOOLS,BUT SOME ROUGHING OUT IS DONE WITH A SMALL ELECTRICALLY DRIVEN BAND SAW AND DRILL.I DON'T KNOW OF ANY MODERN POWER TOOLS WHICH WOULD BE OF USE IN VIOLIN MAKING.THERE MAY BE SOME OF WHICH I HAVE NEVER HEARD". {BOB RAYMOND}WAS LEADER OF SUDBURY ORCHESTRA FOR A NUMBER OF YEARS.
